name: demo-express-gateway
description: Express Gateway Instance Bootstraped from Command Line

scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && npx babel src --out-dir dist --copy-files
scripts.watch:server: npx kill-port 8080 && npx nodemon --exec npx babel-node src/server.js --watch src
scripts.serve: npm run build && pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js
